databaseConfig.sql: SELECT MS_THI_IRAI_SBT_ID, THI_IRAI_SBT_NAME, SHOW_ORDER, SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO, USER_KEY, RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID, TS FROM MS_THI_IRAI_SBT ORDER BY SHOW_ORDER

SELECT MS_THI_IRAI_SBT_ID, THI_IRAI_SBT_NAME, SHOW_ORDER, SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO, USER_KEY, RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID, TS FROM MS_THI_IRAI_SBT
where MS_THI_IRAI_SBT_ID = :MS_THI_IRAI_SBT_ID

INSERT INTO MS_THI_IRAI_SBT( MS_THI_IRAI_SBT_ID, THI_IRAI_SBT_NAME, SHOW_ORDER, SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( :MS_THI_IRAI_SBT_ID, :THI_IRAI_SBT_NAME, :SHOW_ORDER, :SEND_FLAG, :VESSEL_ID, :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_THI_IRAI_SBT SET THI_IRAI_SBT_NAME = :THI_IRAI_SBT_NAME, SHOW_ORDER = :SHOW_ORDER, SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO = :DATA_NO, USER_KEY = :USER_KEY, RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID, TS = :TS
WHERE MS_THI_IRAI_SBT_ID = :MS_THI_IRAI_SBT_ID AND TS = :TS
